differences.old_value: Faculty of Sexual and Reproductive Healthcare

differences.old_value: Faculty of Sexual and Reproductive Healthcare is funded by the following to act as the group's secretariat: Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists, MSI Reproductive Choices, Bayer Healthcare, and Organon Pharma (UK) Limited. From : 29/10/2024 To  : 28/10/2025
